I build things for the web
I’m a web developer specializing in building immersive and exceptional web applications. Currently, I’m focused on building accessible, human-centered products that are easy to use with user-friendly experiences.
01.

About Us

Hello! My name is Rukewe and i enjoy creating things that live on the internet, My interest in web development started few years ago when i decided to try editing custom WordPress themes -- turns out to become a passion i enjoy!

Fast-forward to today, and I’ve had the privilege of working as a freelancer on my leisure time and contributed to several open-source projects. My main focus these days is solving day to day problems with modern technology.

Here are a few technologies that I've been working with recently:

Javascript (ES6+)

React JS

Node.js

Git

Express JS

API

Firebase

MongoDB

02.

Some Things I've Built

Featured Project

DevJobs App

Being a developer myself, i understand how fustrating it is to find jobs, here is a Job Portal app to find and filter job search, With dark mode to automatically have the correct color scheme chosen for them based on user device preferences.

React

MUI prefers-color-scheme

React-router-dom

React-icons

Featured Project

Shortly Url

Bored of trying to remember websites with long url? Here is a app that can help you to shorten any website url with just a button click. Shortened Url are saved in local session storage so its saved even after page refresh.

React

API

React-query

Material UI

Featured Project

Where in the world

This is a app that displays all countries with infos, Users can search by country name or filter by select dropdown, I got the design inspiration from frontend mentor challenges.

React

API

React-query

MUI dark mode

Featured Project

HSA news app

HSA is a modern, easy to use, and easy to navigate news app. It enables readers to search for and read articles in a split-second. The app uses modern Web technologies like React, Redux, and API Fetch to build it's backend and frontend.

React

API

Fetch

Styled Components

Featured Project

Color Generator

Trying to find the perfect color for your next project? A random color generator app will help you out! This app lets you generate random colors with a few clicks of a button. It's an easy way to get inspired with a splash of bright and bold colors that will surely inspire your next piece of art.

React

React-dom

Values.js

Featured Project

Real Estate app

This is a full stack housing marketplace. users can register a profile and list their properties or explore available for rents, The frontend is powered by React and the backend by Firebase firestore.
